content:
Hard Wax 是一家位于德国柏林克罗伊茨贝格区的唱片店。它由德国Techno组合Basic Channel的两位成员（Mark Ernestus和Moritz Von Oswald） 于 1989 年 12 月在 Reichenberger Straße 大楼的底层创立开业。Hard Wax专门经营Techno、雷鬼、Dub和Dubstep等音乐，还担任与Basic Channel音乐美学相关的几家柏林唱片公司的分销商。其部分员工（或前成员）包括著名的 DJ，如 DJ Hell、Modeselektor 的 Gernot Bronsert、Marcel Dettmann、DJ Rok、Gabriele“Mo”Loschelder 或负责 1993 年至 1996 年销​​售的 Electric Indigo (Susanne Kirchmayr) . 该店也通过其网站设置了邮购系统（占2009年销售额的50%）。

 

1996 年，Hard Wax 搬到了位于 Paul-Lincke-Ufer 44a 的一家旧工厂的三楼，与 Basic Channel 厂牌以及 Dubplates and Mastering Studio共用一个场地。它是柏林最古老的电子音乐唱片店之一。作为世界Techno社区的重要枢纽，这家唱片店为 90 年代这个新兴场景的发展提供了广泛的帮助。此外，与柏林的 Tresor 俱乐部一样，它与底特律电子音乐家在所谓的“柏林-底特律轴心”中有着特殊的关系。
contentEn:
Hard Wax is a record shop located in the Kreuzberg borough of Berlin, Germany. It was founded in December 1989 by Mark Ernestus at the ground floor of a Reichenberger Straße’s building. It is specialized in techno music, reggae, dub and dubstep. Hard Wax also serves as a distributor for several Berlin-based record labels linked to the Basic Channel aesthetic. Some members (or former members) of its staff are prominent DJs like DJ Hell, Gernot Bronsert of Modeselektor, Marcel Dettmann, DJ Rok, Gabriele „Mo“ Loschelder or Electric Indigo (Susanne Kirchmayr) who was in charge of sales from 1993 to 1996. The shop sets place a mail order system through its website (which represented 50% of the sales in 2009).

 

In 1996 Hard Wax moved to the third floor of an old factory in Paul-Lincke-Ufer 44a sharing its premises with the Basic Channel record label and the Dubplates and Mastering studio. It’s one of the oldest record stores in electronic music in Berlin. Playing the role of an important hub for the techno community in the world, the shop helped extensively the development of this burgeoning scene in the 90s. Furthermore, as with Tresor club in Berlin, it shares a privileged relationship with the musicians of Detroit techno in the so-called "Berlin-Detroit axis".
